title: 【TreeAssist插件】关于自动补种的问题
author: jackie3000
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jackie3000 于 2014-5-11 16:49 编辑 

本人开设服务器中加入了砍树插件，自动砍树倒是没有问题。
但是自动补种下树苗以后大约在五到六秒内放置在地上的树苗便会被破坏，只能手动补种。

是不是因为插件冲突？还是说配置文件有误？


config在此：
Main:
  Automatic Tree Destruction: true
  Use Permissions: false
  Sapling Replant: true
  Apply Full Tool Damage: true
  Ignore User Placed Blocks: false
  Use mcMMO if Available: true
  Destroy Only Blocks Above: false
  Auto Plant Dropped Saplings: true
Automatic Tree Destruction:
  Forced Removal: false
  Initial Delay (seconds): 10
  Delay (ticks): 0
  Tree Types:
    Birch: true
    Jungle: true
    BigJungle: true
    Oak: true
    Spruce: true
    Brown Shroom: true
    Red Shroom: true
    Acacia: true
    Dark Oak: true
  Cooldown (seconds): 0
Auto Plant Dropped Saplings:
  Chance (percent): 90
  Delay (seconds): 1
Leaf Decay:
  Fast Leaf Decay: true
Sapling Replant:
  Bottom Block has to be Broken First: true
  Time to Protect Sapling (Seconds): 0
  Replant When Tree Burns Down: true
  Block all breaking of Saplings: false
  Delay until Sapling is replanted (seconds) (minimum 1 second): 1
  Tree Types to Replant:
    Birch: true
    Jungle: true
    BigJungle: true
    Oak: true
    Spruce: true
    Brown Shroom: true
    Red Shroom: true
    Acacia: true
    Dark Oak: true
Tools:
  Sapling Replant Require Tools: true
  Tree Destruction Require Tools: true
  Tools List:
  - DIAMOND_AXE
  - WOOD_AXE
  - GOLD_AXE
  - IRON_AXE
  - STONE_AXE
  Drop Chance:
    DIAMOND_AXE: 100
    WOOD_AXE: 100
    GOLD_AXE: 100
    IRON_AXE: 100
    STONE_AXE: 100
Worlds:
  Enable Per World: true
  Enabled Worlds:
  - world
  - zy
Custom Drops:
  APPLE: 0.1
  GOLDEN_APPLE: 0.0
Placed Blocks:
  Handler Plugin Name: TreeAssist
Modding:
  Custom Logs:
  - -1
  Custom Tree Blocks:
  - -1
  Custom Saplings:
  - -1
Debug: none
Config Help: dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/tree-assist/pages/config-walkthrough/
